oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Wesley McCann
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy image of Sgt. Wesley McCann. Co. A, 59th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., CSA, a unit composed largely of Monroe County men. He was captured at Vicksburg and, like other conscripted East Tennessee Confederates, later joined the Union Army. McCann enlisted in Co. E, 7th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. He was captured in 1864 but escaped. He later testified in circuit court in a case dealing with bushwhackers. He was born on April 30, 1827 and died on November 25, 1919. The image shows McCann as a Confederate.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: McCann, Wesley
